UserInterface

Class OrdersViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserInterface.OrdersViewController

  • public class OrdersViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the Access FXML file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OrdersViewController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accessoryRadioOn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sets a typeF textField invisible
      void addOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Decides the type of order being added to the order list depending on the radio button selected, then calls the addOrderProduct method on the view model with the int parameter corresponding to the specific radio button
      void addToStorage(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      If there is a order selected from the table, calls the addToStorage method on the view model, if there is no order selected it shows an error message in the GUI.
      void consoleRadioOn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sets a typeF textField invisible
      void deleteOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      If a product is selected from the table then calls deleteProduct method on the view model else shows an error in the GUI.
      void exit(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Exits the current scene
      void init(OrdersViewModel orderVM, ViewHandler viewHandler)
      Initializer method that binds some of the textfields and labels found in the fxml file to the view model
      void videoGameRadioOn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Sets a typeF textField visible

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
